casebody.data:
Matthew McKNIGHT, et al., petitioners,
v.
Steven O. PETERSEN, on Behalf of L.P., a Minor and Beneficiary and as Personal Representative of the Estate of Steven V. Petersen. No. 16-1003. Supreme Court of the United States June 12, 2017.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of White v. Pauly, 580 U.S. ----, 137 S.Ct. 548, 196 L.Ed.2d 463 (2017)(per curiam) .
